Reviews.Title: Just right
Reviews.Author: A. Cambron
Reviews.Content: My favorite part about this phone is its kick stand.  This is my first HTC product and I really dig the set up.  The phone fits my needs.  I am still learning its features and am really happy with it so far.

Reviews.Title: HTC Tunderbolt
Reviews.Author: Tarva LaBostrie
Reviews.Content: We received our HTC Thunderbolt pretty quickly. It works just fine, but was a little beat up. But overall we were satisfied with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Todd M.
Reviews.Content: works great..only issue I have is getting a good signal inside of a building..but other wise good happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Mcconnell
Reviews.Content: Got this to replace my htc rezound after it was dropped and cracked multiple times.  The battery on the rezound was shot and would take 8 hours to charge and then hold the charge only an hour if i used it and maybe 2 if i didn't.  also, it wouldn't charge in the car at all.  Got this phone used to replace it and it's been great.  Charges quickly and holds the charge.  charges in the car.  same system so it took no time to figure out, but even if you're switching from a totally different phone, the system on the htc's are great and user friendly and really easy to figure out and get used to!

Reviews.Title: what i order was unlocked and receive a locked phone
Reviews.Author: Myra J.
Reviews.Content: i was very disappointed because it was not unclocked and the cover was broken did not bring the ear peacwah

Reviews.Title: It worked
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I dropped my Droid RAZR from the top of a 45 ft ladder and destroyed it by accident. (No I wasn't using it, it just fell out of my jacket pocket) This phone worked very well, and did almost everything the RAZR would do, though not as quicky.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone.
Reviews.Author: R. Cooks "cooks1"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a backup/music phone. It has served its purpose well. Have had no problems works perfectly. Would recommend to someone looking for a backup.

Reviews.Title: it was beat up!!!!
Reviews.Author: just me
Reviews.Content: it worked but it was torn up it said good condition  but it wasnt the top was broken to were u can separate the top from the phone was not happy but already started a plan with it so im stuck with it till i can upgrade an tht aint for another year in a half !!!!  an there was a chip out of the bottom left screen tht i was not aware of till i got the phone....

Reviews.Title: thunderbolt
Reviews.Author: matthew madison
Reviews.Content: This was a refurbished phone that came to me in bad condition and I had to get rid of it after only a few months.

Reviews.Title: wifi won't connect
Reviews.Author: RHS
Reviews.Content: pretty much that. also the camera pics were kind of grainy but since i knew i was sending it back i didnt spend any time futzing with the settings.  the one star is for the product, the seller NuTwo was very good about the return and from more reading it seems the wifi issue is something software related for which i would have to get a fix from htc. way too ,much work and if that didn't work i would have missed the return window.  if you are going to be using this mostly off of it's phone signal it might be worth the risk, but i wanted it as a mini mini tablet. so no wifi was a deal killer.

Reviews.Title: ThunderBuddy!
Reviews.Author: Heidi Overstreet
Reviews.Content: This phone is a great replacement for my Droid X2. It has been able to handle all of my apps and heavy usage with out stalling. Battery life is pretty good. The front and back camera works great!

Reviews.Title: BAD BATTERY
Reviews.Author: Marccss
Reviews.Content: THE BATTERY THAT CAME WITH THE PHONE SEEMS TO BE DEFECTIVE AFTER A FEW MONTHS AND HAD TO BE REPLACED....

Reviews.Title: poor phone
Reviews.Author: Thomas s keeler jr
Reviews.Content: The screen popped out a week after we got it three or four times and know it is cracked and going to need fixed

Reviews.Title: love the phone
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Belden
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. The only thing that i can complain about is when im talking on it sometimes i put it between my ear and shoulder and it hangs up on the person im talking to. i gotta learn not to do that. Other than that great phone and great service.

Reviews.Title: Product came as described.
Reviews.Author: Chad The Handyman
Reviews.Content: Came as described but the battery was at the end of its life.  It is a work phone for the crews so they are able to leave it in the van and charge while on jobs so its not that big of a deal. I think they should test the bats before they ship them out.

Reviews.Title: Great service
Reviews.Author: Ms. Tee
Reviews.Content: recieved this phone in a timely fashion i was impressed with it, its very durable and i love it. I needed a second phone due to my previous phone wouldn't hold a charge anymore. I had this phone before and would purchase another one again if i needed too.

Reviews.Title: Worked for an hour.
Reviews.Author: Tamaralee22
Reviews.Content: When I received this phone I charged it for about an hour because it was low on battery. The port was loose and the charged didn't fit correctly. After putting my sims card in and adding a few contacts, it had just shut off. It won't turn back on, even after trying to recharge, pulling the battery, and the recommend hard reset. I wouldn't recommend this if you want something that's going to last you.
